name: Marie Antoinette Bronze Canopy Bed
description:
The Marie- Antoinette bed was inspired by French antique furniture and designed to surround your pet with comfort, grandeur and beauty.
Magnificent four-poster bed with canopy and wrought iron tester. Upholstered with high end bronze color damask. The headboards are trimmed with braid, the four lined curtains are tied back by silken cords with tassels at the end. The bed frame and the canopy at the top of the tester are covered with gold leaf and painted in the traditional manner. An ostrich plume can be put on the canopy.
The cover on the mattress and bolster pillows can be removed for cleaning.

L -28" X W-16" X H-32" (without the feathers)
Weight:  20 lb.

This item is made to order and not eligible for exchange/return.
Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. 
Please contact us for the actual shipping cost to your destination.

Each piece is lovingly hand crafted in the traditional manner. Solid wood is mainly used for most of the framework of the beds, sofas and stools. 
Sumptuous upholstery fabrics are selected to suit the period style.
Most of the mattresses, cushions and bolster pillows are usually stuffed with real feathers for softness and natural comfort.
